categories: Category:Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope voice actors
Category:Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi voice actors

nodes.text: Larry A. Ward (October 2, 1944 - October 15, 2007), a Berkeley-based linguist, developed the Huttese language alongside Ben Burtt on Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. He also provided the voice of both Greedo (in A New Hope) and Jabba the Hutt (in Return of the Jedi).
